official-title.#text: To authorize the Secretary of Transportation to obligate funds for emergency relief projects arising from damage caused by severe weather events in 2013, and for other purposes.

attestation-date.#text: Passed the House of Representatives September 30, 2013.

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: may obligate any funds made available to implement

, for emergency relief projects arising from damage caused by severe weather events in 2013, without any limitation on obligations for such projects resulting from a single natural disaster or a single catastrophic failure in a State.

{http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/}title.#text: 113 HR 3174 EH: To authorize the Secretary of Transportation to obligate funds for emergency relief projects arising from damage caused by severe weather events in 2013, and for other purposes.
